T02TD2824E:172b-0: @172b * // dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2824E:172b-1: sngon nam tshe 'di 'am glo bur gyi //
T02TD2824E:172b-2: las dbang gis khebs klu yi nad //
T02TD2824E:172b-3: rigs bzhi gang gis thebs gyur pa //
T02TD2824E:172b-4: de dag gso ba 'dir bshad bya //
T02TD2824E:172b-5: brag ri nags tshal phug gam ljongs //
T02TD2824E:172b-6: me tog dkar pos rab brgyan par //
T02TD2824E:172b-7: thub pa 'od dpag med kyi sras //
T02TD2824E:172b-8: nad bral 'jig rten mgon po bsgrub //
T02TD2824E:172b-9: gang na klu gnyan sa bdag dang //
T02TD2824E:172b-10: lha dang lha min gyis bstod pa'i //
T02TD2824E:172b-11: rten la mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2824E:172b-12: mdze can rnams la bkur sti bya //
T02TD2824E:172b-13: de nas lhor ni mngon bltas la //
T02TD2824E:172b-15: spyi bo snying gar mgon po h'um //
T02TD2824E:172b-16: dkar dmar gsal bar bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2824E:172b-18: lus can gdug pa gdul bya'i phyir //
T02TD2824E:172b-19: de'i rten dpal ldan thugs rje gtso //
T02TD2824E:172b-20: klu mgon brgyad kyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD2824E:172b-21: dug sel bdud rtsi'i ril 'dzin pa //
T02TD2824E:172b-22: spyan mang 'od dpag med pas mtshan //
T02TD2824E:172b-23: de yi thugs rje'i mi bzad thugs //
T02TD2824E:172b-24: snang mtha' ye shes snying po'i bdag / lus can gdug pa 'dul bya'i phyir //
T02TD2824E:172b-26: bya bas hr'i: yig mnyam gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2824E:172b-28: mdo las rab grags de bzhin sems //
T02TD2824E:172b-29: stobs mthu dpal dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2824E:172b-30: ngo bo yi ge rgyal po'i snying //
T02TD2824E:172b-31: aom a'a:hr'i:sarba buddha garbha shr'i lo ka n'a tham ma sa ka la by'a dhi pra ti pra ha na ka ra ka ra h'um ha ra ha ra h'um /
T02TD2824E:172b-33: b'i b'aratstsha b'ib'aratstsha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2824E:172b-34: sngags 'di rtag tu bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2824E:172b-35: bdag gi dad dang mgon po'i mthus //
T02TD2824E:172b-36: nyid kyi thugs bskul 'od dpag med //
T02TD2824E:172b-37: dug 'joms rgyal po dug sel dang //
T02TD2824E:172b-38: dug gsod nges par 'byin pa dang //
T02TD2824E:172b-39: dug mthar mdzad dang dug med dang //
T02TD2824E:173a-2: 'od zer phyung bas snying dbus spro //
T02TD2824E:173a-12: mthar byed bdud rtsi 'dzag pa yi //
T02TD2824E:173a-13: rgyun gyis gso dang byams pa yis //
T02TD2824E:173a-14: 'od kyi byug pas sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2824E:173a-15: de rjes 'gro ba'i dug sbyang ngo //
T02TD2824E:173a-16: yang na mtho ris sa steng gi //
T02TD2824E:173a-17: sbyor ba gnyis kyi gsad dang gso //
T02TD2824E:173a-18: sbyang pa'i cho ga rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2824E:173a-19: dpal ldan dug sel rgyud las bshad //
T02TD2824E:173a-20: mdze nad gso ba rdzogs so//
